title: Attributes of God Rosary
description: A meditative rosary reflecting on God's divine attributes

cross.title: Opening Invocation
cross.content: Holy, holy, holy is the Lord God Almighty, who was, and is, and is to come.

firstLargeBead.title: Adoration
firstLargeBead.content: We adore You, O God, for Your infinite perfections and glorious attributes.

secondLargeBead.title: Doxology
secondLargeBead.content: Praise God from whom all blessings flow; Praise Him, all creatures here below; Praise Him above, ye heavenly host; Praise Father, Son, and Holy Ghost. Amen.

largeBead.title: Meditation
largeBead.content: God so loved the world that He gave His only Son, that whoever believes in Him should not perish but have eternal life.

prayers.content: Your love, O Lord, reaches to the heavens
Your faithfulness extends to the clouds
Your love is patient and kind

largeBead.title: Meditation
largeBead.content: Oh, the depth of the riches of the wisdom and knowledge of God! How unsearchable are His judgments and His ways past finding out!

refrain.content: In Your wisdom, Lord, You have made all things

largeBead.title: Meditation
largeBead.content: Ah, Lord God! It is You who have made the heavens and the earth by Your great power and by Your outstretched arm! Nothing is too hard for You.

refrain.content: Great is our Lord, and abundant in power

largeBead.title: Meditation
largeBead.content: Who will not fear, O Lord, and glorify Your name? For You alone are holy. All nations will come and worship before You.

refrain.content: Holy, holy, holy is the Lord of hosts

largeBead.title: Meditation
largeBead.content: Your steadfast love, O Lord, extends to the heavens, Your faithfulness to the clouds.

refrain.content: Great is Your faithfulness, O God my Father
